==About EasyPHP 13.1==
EasyPHP is an easy to install Apache, MySQL, and PHP for windows (Also abbreviated called WAMP). EasyPHP is really very easy to install and to use - just download, install and you are on the go. It also contains a nice adminstration web interface, from which you can change PHP Versions, add or deltete modules, configure vhosts, and lots of other things.
{{images/easyphp.png}}
==Features of EasyPHP 13.1==
# Apache 2.4.4
# MySQL 5.6.11
# PHP 5.5.x, 5.4.x, 5.3.x, 5.2.x
# phpMyAdmin 3.5.8.1, 4.0.3
